mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_ID, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_PLACE, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PLAN_ID, PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_PLACE, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE FROM TB_PLAN left join TB_USER_PL UP using(PLAN_ID) where up.user_id = #{userId}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{ paging.startRow } AND #{ paging.endRow } order by PLAN_START_DATE desc, PLAN_END_DATE desc
select count(*) from TB_PLAN left join TB_USER_PL UP using(PLAN_ID) where up.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PLAN (PLAN_TITLE, PLAN_PLACE, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE) values (#{planTitle},#{planPlace}, #{planStartDate},#{planEndDate})
mapper.update: update TB_PLAN set PLAN_TITLE = #{planTitle}, PLAN_PLACE = #{planPlace}, PLAN_START_DATE = #{planStartDate}, PLAN_END_DATE = #{planEndDate} where PLAN_ID = #{planId}
